Hub Ivoire Tech a pour vocation d'être l: Hub Ivoire Tech has the mission of being the largest Campus of Startups in Africa. It brings together an ecosystem of incubators, accelerators, investors, experts and entrepreneurs to stimulate innovation and transform ideas into concrete successes in the Ivory Coast and beyond.
Nous offrons une gamme complète de servi: We offer a complete range of services to accompany entrepreneurs at every stage of their development: incubation and acceleration programs (with coaching, mentoring and masterclasses), modern coworking spaces, equipped meeting rooms, relaxation areas, innovation labs, as well as administrative support to facilitate your procedures.
Comment puis-je réserver une visite du c: How can I book a campus visit ?
Il vous suffit de remplir le formulaire: You can book a campus visit by filling out the visit reservation form on our website, indicating your contact information, the date and time you would like to visit, and the purpose of your visit. Once your request is submitted, our team will contact you to confirm and finalize your appointment.
Qui peut bénéficier de vos programmes d': Who can benefit from your programs ?
Nos programmes s'adressent aux startups,: Our programs are designed for startups, project promoters, and entrepreneurs who wish to materialize their ideas. Whether you are in the creation phase or in full growth, Hub Ivoire Tech offers personalized support to boost your development through a network of experts and strategic partners.
Comment rester informé·e des actualités: How can I stay informed about the latest news and events ?
Pour être tenu·e au courant de nos derni: To stay informed about our latest news, formations, hackathons and other events, subscribe to our newsletter and activate WhatsApp notifications. You will receive important and relevant information directly in your email or on your phone.
